body_html:
You need to install cuda 9 version of libnccl https://github.com/FuriouslyCurious/pytorch/blob/master/Dockerfile#L12-L13, and also comment out this line https://github.com/FuriouslyCurious/pytorch/blob/master/Dockerfile#L28, because magma for cuda 9 is not yet available, and cuda 8 magma causes hangs on multi-GPU systems.
Also would be nice if you add compling for 7.0 compute capability for those lucky ones who have voltas https://github.com/FuriouslyCurious/pytorch/blob/master/Dockerfile#L27
